Subjects: carols, Annunciation; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to
_description: Annunciation carol — five quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Regina celi letare,’ plus burden (bb): Now synge we syng we ‘Regina celi letare’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Gabriell þat angell bryȝtBryȝter þan þe
                    sonne is lyȝt …
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines: …To saue þe solves þat war forlostLetare

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Gabryell that angell bryghtBryghtter than the son
                    lyght…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…hou kepe & save vs all from teneRegina celi
                    letareExplicit
